questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
This arc is notable for its depiction of the Straw Hat Pirates' battle against the Donquixote Family. What is...?
This arc features a battle on an island with a giant tree, where Luffy and crew face off against a Warlord of the Sea and a corrupt king. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability grants the power to transform into a hybrid and full giraffe form. What is...?
questions.answer: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

questions.question: This power, belonging to a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows the user to sprout limbs and duplicate body parts. What is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
